content: repeat row 24f for wide feet row 25f-49f repeat row 24f cut the yarn leg part works on leaving stitches of the row 22 keeping the direction of crocheting to get the same texture row 23l start with slip_stitch in 27th stitch of the row 22 chain 1 39 single_crochet blo 1st single_crochet blo into the same stitch where was last slip_stitch turn row 24l chain 1 39 single_crochet blo turn for narrow feet row 25l-45l repeat row 24l for wide feet row 25l-49l repeat row 24l 4 all rights reserved pattern photos yoga socks - author asya instagram/fb pinterest reddit @madebyasya more photos are here https //www instagram com/explore/tags/mba_yogasocks/ more patterns in my etsy shop https //madebyasya etsy com and on ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/madebyasya stitch types pictures - opensource second part of the body narrow feet wide feet row 46 row 50 chain 1 39 single_crochet blo along row 45l 49l 26 single_crochet blo along row 45f 49f turn row 47 row 51 chain 1 65 single_crochet blo turn for narrow feet see the connect row for wide feet row 52-57 repeat row 51 connect row this row connects the yoga sock into a ring circle fold double like on picture drop the loop from your hook insert your hook from front to back in 1st foundation chain of the sock grab the dropped loop with your hook and pull it through the stitch chain 1 65 single_crochet blo work in each chain of foundation chain where were 65 single_crochet of the row 1 and in each single_crochet of the row 47 57 cut and fasten the yarn turn inside out wrong side inside make the other yoga sock the same way 5 all rights reserved pattern photos yoga socks -
